title: AWSN Talk Hacking With Linux
description: This workshop aims to build foundational command line skills by using practical exercises and CTF challenges. The presentation will also cover some command line tools commonly used in offensive security engagements. If you’ve ever been keen to try Linux but haven’t known where to start this is the presentation for you. After the presentation there will be 3 categories of CTF challenges to work though.

environment.uimessage1: Welcome to Linux, CTFs have been loaded. Have fun!
